main_definition: Large describes something that is of considerable size, extent or quantity.

meanings_and_examples.example: The large elephant was a majestic sight.
She owned a large piece of farmland on the outskirts of town.
The warehouse stored thousands of large crates waiting to be shipped.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Highly developed or advanced in some way
meanings_and_examples.example: This city is a large metropolis with many modern amenities and skyscrapers.
